description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

Unique_IdentifierObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Unique_IdentifierObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Unique_IdentifierObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Search_Settings_Data.description: Specify the object types that are suppressed by default in search results.  Suppressions are not applied to domain searches and can be turned off by using the "all:" domain.

validation.validation: The workday term you entered does not match any tasks or standard reports.
The same workday term cannot be used for more than one synonym.

Search_Settings_Data.description: Create synonyms for Workday Terms to help make tasks and standard reports more easily discovered using worker's terminology. Enter the Workday Term using the tenant base language, then define synonyms separated by comma (i.e. "PTO, vacation, holiday").Synonyms in different languages can be listed together. However, if many synonyms will be defined across several languages, it is recommended to define synonyms below in the tenant base language and then use the Business Object Translation task to create translations in other languages.

validation.validation: The same workday term cannot be used for more than one synonym.
